author: ValiantGoat

text: This is my favourite dungeon theme of Chrono Trigger.  The only flaw being that the battle music would interrupt the theme.  In Giant's Claw this wasn't the case.  This music definitely fits the situation of Ayla's tribe.  They were about to be exterminated and this concluded with the final struggle with Azala and the Black Tyranno.  I also enjoyed the bit of character development on Azala accepting the fate of her species dying.
